channel.title: StockHedges
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from StockHedges, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: H&M shares fall as much as 8% on profit miss and scrapped earnings margin target
item.description: Shares of H&M tumbled as much as 8% on Thursday after the world's second-largest listed fashion retailer posted a miss on operating profit.

item.title: Oil Price Expected to Weaken If OPEC+ Hikes Supply
item.description: Expectations that the OPEC and its allies will start unwinding voluntary output curbs of 2.2 million barrels a day starting from December is adding to...

item.title: A High-Profile Clean-Energy Startup Is Running Short on Cash
item.description: Monolith is struggling to meet production targets needed for $1 billion government loan.

item.title: The Fed Made Its Move. Why Didn't I?
item.description: In which our columnist investigates a financial pitfall called the ‘flypaper effect,’ only to find that he was trapped in it himself.

item.title: We ranked the latest earnings reports from 30 portfolio stocks from great to ugly
item.description: Our companies' performances were reflective of the S&P 500 firms in aggregate.

item.title: The Score: Costco, Micron, EchoStar and More Stocks That Defined the Week
item.description: Here are some of the major companies whose stocks moved on the week’s news.

item.title: We're upping our price target on Costco after another steady quarter fortifies our thesis
item.description: The retailer's fourth-quarter results were mixed, but we have more conviction in Costco's appeal to shoppers.

item.title: TD Nears Guilty Plea on Criminal Charges for U.S. Unit in Money-Laundering Probe
item.description: U.S. prosecutors have alleged that TD was reckless in failing to build and maintain systems that flagged and prevented money-laundering.

item.title: Darden Restaurants earnings disappoint as Olive Garden, fine dining sales struggle
item.description: Olive Garden parent Darden Restaurants reported weaker-than-expected earnings and revenue for its fiscal first quarter.

item.title: Adobe stock slips on soft fourth-quarter revenue guidance
item.description: Adobe reported third-quarter results on Thursday that beat Wall Street expectations for sales and earnings.
